briefTitle: Myeloid-Derived Suppressor Cell Function in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Myeloid-Derived Suppressor Cell Function in Breast Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Isolate unfavorable immune cells MDSC from the peripheral blood or tumors of study subjects and test how strongly they inhibit function of favorable immune cells called Natural Killer Cells.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18 years of age or older
* Ability to give informed consent
* Stage I-III breast malignancy

Exclusion Criteria:

* Unable to tolerate venipuncture
